        返回:

      • deleteTopicBySeminarId

        boolean deleteTopicBySeminarId(java.math.BigInteger seminarId)
        按seminarId删除话题.

        根据seminarId获得topic信息，然后再根据topic删除seninargrouptopic信息和StudentScoreGroup信息，最后再根据删除topic信息

        参数:
        BigInteger - seminarId 讨论课Id
        返回:
        true/false 是否成功删除
        另请参阅:
        #listTopicBySeminarId(BigInteger seminarId), #deleteSeminarGroupTopicByTopicId(BigInteger topicId), #deleteStudentScoreGroupByTopicId(BigInteger topicId)
